text: One of them, Cori Thomas, told Variety that she was a 16 - year - old friend of Mr. Hoffman ’ s daughter, Karina, and an aspiring actor when she met Mr. Hoffman in 1980. She said that the three of them spent a Sunday walking around Manhattan. Then they all went to Mr. Hoffman ’ s hotel room to wait for Ms. Thomas ’ s parents to pick her up, she told Variety. After Karina left, Mr. Hoffman took a shower and emerged with a towel wrapped around him, “ which he dropped, ” Ms. Thomas told Variety. “ He was standing there naked.
